entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 3.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Powell River Airport 07:00 AM PST Saturday 21 January 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 3.9°C

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: 3.4°C
Wind: ESE 17 km/h gust 28 km/h

entry.title: Saturday: Rain. Temperature steady near plus 4.
entry.summary: Rain. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 near the Strait of Georgia this morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 this afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers early this evening. Clearing late this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 21 January 2023
